name: Unicorns and anime coloring
description:
Coloring by numbers is quite simple even for small kids. We choose a lot of pretty images in pixel art which can be liked by children e.g. kids can color a unicorn or ice cream.
Also, many pixel images for adults are available too. For example, you can color astronaut or celebrity or anime picture.

Please, rate our coloring app ColorPix! It’s very important for us because your reviews highly motivate us to improve the coloring pages in 2019!
